comment.author: 71256895@N00
comment._content:
Ye Olde King's Head,  48 - 50 Lower Bridge St., Chester CH1 1RS, England 
Constructed in about 1208, restored in 1935 and 1960's.
In the 1881 Census the Innkeeper of the Kings Head Inn, 44, Lower Bridge Street,
was James Grice, 31, with him were his wife Maria, 32, a Barman, George Percival and Domestic Servant, Ann Fieldstead.
